price: 76. Tokkel firqawnaa kee kay marah Ni xaquk Nabii Muusa luk yemeete cakki ken yoofe waqdi, diggah ah baxxaqqaÍe baaba iyyen.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
